content.content: Problem is, you’d also have to introduce delays so that split votes couldn’t be tracked via timing. And you’d need to shuffle a large wallet to avoid people simply tracing back from the smaller ones. Hiding the outcome of a vote via a secret would not provide anonymity, but would prevent voters being influenced by others, though I’m not sure if that’s really an issue given the open nature of the governance process anyway.
